title: Implement User Authentication with OAuth2
description: Integrate OAuth2 providers (Google, GitHub) for secure user login and signup, enhancing user experience and security. This includes setting up redirects, token handling, and session management.

title: Fix Database Connection Leak in ORM
description: Address the reported issue where database connections are not being properly closed after queries, leading to resource exhaustion and performance degradation under heavy load. Investigate ORM configuration and connection pool management.

title: Optimize Image Loading Performance for Dashboard
description: Improve the loading speed of images on the user dashboard by implementing lazy loading, optimizing image sizes (webp format conversion), and utilizing a CDN for faster delivery. Aim for a 2-second reduction in page load time.

title: Research and Evaluate New Monitoring Tools
description: Explore and evaluate alternative application performance monitoring (APM) and logging tools to potentially replace current solutions. Focus on tools offering better insights into microservices architecture and real-time error tracking. This will involve creating a comparison matrix and conducting trial runs.

title: Develop CI/CD Pipeline for Frontend Deployment
description: Set up an automated Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery pipeline for the frontend application using GitHub Actions. This will include automated testing, build processes, and deployment to a staging environment upon code merge.

title: Refactor Legacy API Endpoints to RESTful Standards
description: Modernize outdated API endpoints to adhere to RESTful principles, including consistent naming conventions, proper HTTP methods, and standardized response formats. This will improve API clarity and maintainability.
